name: Flax Retter
description: A facility for processing flax into linen fiber; adventurers can purchase quality cloth, learn about textile production, or find evidence of industrial accidents.
atmosphere: The facility is filled with the earthy scent of flax and the sharp tang of processing chemicals. The sound of machinery and the rhythmic work of processing creates an industrious, methodical atmosphere. The air carries the promise of quality textiles and the essential nature of cloth production.
